channel.title: G.E Search Function Help 508
channel.description: So yeah, maybe extremely noob but the button ID(13- exit button) on the 105 interface (GE) doesn't close the search overlay that pops up when you press the 'buy' option on the main interface... just wondering if anyone knows how to remove this... I've tried a few things.. and no removechatboxinterface won't work... It's quite annoying having it not go away... I'm sure there's a simple fix to it :P thanks..

item.title: G.E Search Function Help 508
item.dc:creator: @hasumon hasumon
item.description:
@hasumon wrote:

Something withremoveAllWindows(); or c.getPA().removeAllWindows();I’m guessing? (hard to tell with new sources)

Read full topic

item.title: G.E Search Function Help 508
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

So yeah, maybe extremely noob but the button ID(13- exit button) on the 105 interface (GE) doesn’t close the search overlay that pops up when you press the ‘buy’ option on the main interface… just wondering if anyone knows how to remove this… I’ve tried a few things… and no removechatboxinterface won’t work… It’s quite annoying having it not go away… I’m sure there’s a simple fix to it thanks…
